melody_GT.lyrics: Let it be, let it be, let it be, let it be. Whisper words of wisdom, let it be.

baseline.lyrics: Let it be, let it be, let it be, let it be. Whisper words of wisdom, let it be.

variant_a.lyrics: Let it be, let it be, let it be, let it be. Whisper some wisdom, let it be.

variant_b.lyrics: Let it be, let it be, let it be, oh let it be. Whisper words of wisdom, let it be.

melody_GT.lyrics: Hey Jude, don't make it bad. Take a sad song and make it better.

baseline.lyrics: Hey Jude, don't make it bad. Take a sad song and make it better.

variant_a.lyrics: Hey Jude, don't make it bad. Take a sad tune and make it better.
